channel.title: Need Arrow Dupe Fix
channel.description:
Hey guys In my server there is an arrow dupe where players buy two different types of arrows. Then they equip one and place 1 of the other in the bank. Then they swap the two arrows out and withdraw the 1 arrow so they have two stacks of the same kind. Then they go to trade and click the "x" on the 1 and enter "X" where x is the amount in other stack and it dupes!
Any fixes/ideas would be appreciated!

item.title: Need Arrow Dupe Fix
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Did you even try to google the problem?
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/253349-pi-arrow-dupe-fix.html

Read full topic
